citations.narrative:
The wire mesh fence in one of the pig enclosures had a hole (measuring approximately 6 inches x 6 inches). The
damaged mesh had sharp points facing inside the enclosure. Damaged metal mesh can be a safety concern for the
animals within the enclosure. Outdoor housing facilities must be structurally sound and maintained in good repair to
protect the animals from injury and to contain the animals. Correct by 5/14/2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
